name: Mermail Abysstrite
effectText:
3 Level 3 monsters
When your opponent targets exactly 1 face-up "Mermail" monster you control for an attack, or with a Spell/Trap effect that could have targeted this card (except during the Damage Step) (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; that attack/effect now targets this card. When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Mermail" monster in your GY, except "Mermail Abysstrite"; Special Summon that target.
